description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nSquelch:
After an enemy is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_DISARMED}, they are also afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}, depending on whether their {STAT_attack} or {STAT_intelligence} is higher. This trait does not stack.
name: Gloopdiator Gel
